duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop multiple collections of luxury indoor and outdoor furniture.
Responsible for 3D modeling and rendering of furniture concepts and solutions.
Use SketchUp to create accurate furniture models that are easily editable.
Create accurate dimensional drawings for fabrication.
Apply knowledge of multiple materials to produce realistic renderings.
Review factory drawings to ensure correct logic was used before getting approval by the Lead Designer.
Manage project folder with current up-to-date files, while also archiving old ones.
Maintain design boards with current concept direction and assortment.
Create digital presentations of concept direction and assortment.
Work with cross-functional teams to ensure a smooth transition from Design to Production.

education_certification.credential: 1-3 years of experience in Product Design. Furniture industry preferred.
Basic understanding of design and furniture details, materials, and finishes.
Highly organized and able to manage multiple projects.
Proficiency in SketchUp, Keyshot, and Adobe Creative Suite.
